name: Watched Grand Designs, Season 18 - Harringey, London: Victorian Gatehouse
Grand Designs, Season 18 - Harringey, London: Victorian Gatehouse

item.value: Grand Designs, Season 18 - Harringey, London: Victorian Gatehouse

content.html:
Kevin McCloud meets neurologists Penny Talelli and Mark Edwards, who plan to combine their love of old and contemporary architecture as they transform a derelict Victorian gatehouse in North London. However, the pair soon find themselves struggling to balance their busy working lives alongside project managing the build.

Watched on Fire TV
content.value:
Kevin McCloud meets neurologists Penny Talelli and Mark Edwards, who plan to combine their love of old and contemporary architecture as they transform a derelict Victorian gatehouse in North London. However, the pair soon find themselves struggling to balance their busy working lives alongside project managing the build.
Watched on Fire TV

summary: I didn’t really like this one. While there was certainly merit to what they were doing, they really didn’t seem invested in the project at all. Finished house was pretty spectacularly soul-less, to the extent that the entire hour seemed utterly wasted.
